title: Initial vote on PPWR signals relief for policymakers - Zero Waste Europe
summary: The European Parliament's Environment (ENVI) Committee has adopted a compromise amendment to the Packaging and Packaging Waste Regulation (PPWR) that includes targets for reuse and restrictions on single-use packaging.  The amendment was adopted despite opposition from the right-wing EPP and ECR parties, who sought to delete the reuse targets completely.  The final tally in the ENVI Committee concluded with 56 in favor of the bill, 23 against, and 5 abstentions, marking the end to the first stage of intense deliberations on the file.
